name: Statler Toyota
description: A gleaming showroom, promising a future that may or may not arrive. Inside Statler Toyota, the showroom gleams with the latest models, their chrome reflecting the harsh fluorescent lights, a stark contrast to the aging downtown outside. A friendly, if slightly pushy, salesman approaches you, his smile as polished as the cars. The scent of new car upholstery and ambition hangs in the air, a potent cocktail of consumerism and aspiration. A large banner proclaims 'Statler Toyota: Your Future is Now!', a promise that feels both exciting and vaguely threatening. The only exit is back out to Main St., where the future is decidedly less shiny.
